name: VEGA Conflict
description: Stake your claim, command your fleets, and wage epic war in space.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any compatible with OS
